past

  • Advertising effects on consumer demand: I worked with GÃ¼nter Hitsch and Bradley Shapiro at the Booth School of Business in 2016 - 2017 to investigate the effects of TV advertising on consumer purchases using regression discontinuities. I created a pipeline to clean and build the data for analysis. [github]

  • Enhancer prediction and feature ranking of enhancer marks: I was a participant in the 2015 DIMACS REU program at Rutgers University. I worked with Kevin Chen to analyze epigenetic data and predict enhancers using various statistical methods. [DIMACS][pdf]


just for fun

  • Statistics X app: I developed content, including video lectures and quizzes, for the Statistics X app with Knowvio, a mobile education startup founded by UChicago students. The app was launched in 2016. [Knowvio][iOS app]

  • Econometrics Game: The econometrics game is a day-long competition held at UChicago where teams work on a data-driven research question. Finalists are chosen to present their findings to a panel of judges. Our team finished 2nd in both 2015 and 2016. [Event][2015 pdf][2016 pdf]

  • Flappy Bird analysis: For my first statistical project in 2014, my friend Anthony and I collected Flappy Bird game scores and wrote up a report. [pdf]
